intro: Meliosma kontumensis, commonly known as the Kontum meliosma, is a rare flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Vietnam. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and related trees. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in secondary forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
